full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Shower Replacement Services at Bath Institution**

**Contract Reference:** cb-263-34335918

**Publication Date:** 2024-01-15

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-02-20T10:00:00

**Solicitation Number:** 21423-24-4601839

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is soliciting proposals for the replacement of existing shower and tub units at Bath Institution. This requirement is subject to the Trade Agreements Act.

**Description of Work:**

The CSC requires a qualified contractor to replace thirteen (13) tub/shower units and thirteen (13) stand-alone shower units. The scope of work includes:

* Removal and disposal of existing units
* Repair or replacement of damaged drywall and sub-floors
* Installation of new backing to minimize flexing of new units
* Installation of new grey, waterproof flooring
* Replacement of shower valves and shower heads with equivalent models
* Painting of the affected areas with mildew-resistant paint

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Price
* Technical capabilities

**Delivery Schedule:**

The Contractor must complete the work within eight (8) weeks from the date of notification of acceptance of the offer.

**Contact Information:**

Robin Riha
Contracting Authority
(613) 328-9727
robin.riha@csc-scc.gc.ca

**Document Availability:**

All relevant documents, including the Statement of Work and Evaluation Criteria, are available for download on the Canadabuys website.

The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Bidders may submit their proposals in either English or French.
